name: Logo
description: Logo component for displaying application or brand logos. Supports both image URLs and custom content.

props.name: src
props.description: The source URL of the logo image

props.name: children
props.description: Custom logo content such as text or SVG

examples.title: Basic
examples.code:
import { Logo } from '@/components';

<Logo src="/logo.svg" alt="Company Logo" />

bestPractices: Use appropriate dimensions for the context
Provide both expanded and collapsed variants for responsive layouts
